outfitAnalysis.fitAssessment: Generally well-fitted with intentional oversizing on the shirt

recommendations: Consider rolling up the sleeves of the shirt for a more relaxed look
A belt that matches the tone of the loafers would tie the outfit together
Adding a blazer in charcoal or navy would elevate this for more formal settings
A pocket square in burgundy would add a pop of color for special occasions
benefits: The suggested adjustments will maintain comfort while looking more polished
These recommendations work with your existing wardrobe without requiring major purchases
The proposed changes are versatile and can be mixed with other items you own
These suggestions align with current trends while maintaining a timeless appeal
